name: Primary Color Man 2 - Demo
description:
A twisted origins to the most vicious entity. 

Primary Color Man 2 Demo is a continuation and the beginning of a famous serial killer story, who is believed to be wearing a skin suit made of primary colors. A city journalist is trying to crack the case of a lifetime. During an investigation, you are able to find clues and more information about the mysterious entity. 

The demo has 3 endings. 

The project has been in development for a long time. Due to personal reasons, I was unable to finish the game. I thought leaving the game completely and deleting the current work would be unfair. I am sharing this so everyone can have a glimpse of what the game could have been. Your feedback and comments would be a huge help. Don't hesitate to share the playthroughs. I hope you enjoy the experience. 

Special Thanks To Adam Woodsmith - Leonvincible, who created the character of Primary Color Man. 

The controls are available during the gameplay.
